    ICommentDao, ICourseNotesDao, ICourseNotesReferenceDao, IReplyDao, IVideoDao, IVideoReferenceDao

extends java.lang.Object
implements ICommentDao, IReplyDao, IVideoDao, IVideoReferenceDao, ICourseNotesDao, ICourseNotesReferenceDao
